19: לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> י֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>day</n> אֶחָ֛ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>one</n> תֹּאכְל֖וּן <sup>398 </sup> <n>Ye shall not eat</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> יוֹמָ֑יִם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>nor two days</n> וְלֹ֣א ׀ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> חֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <sup>2568 </sup> <n>nor five</n> יָמִ֗ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>days</n> וְלֹא֙ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> עֲשָׂרָ֣ה <sup>6235 </sup> <n>neither ten</n> יָמִ֔ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>days</n> וְלֹ֖א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <sup>6242 </sup> <n>nor twenty</n> יֽוֹם׃ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>days</n>

31: וְר֜וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>a wind</n> נָסַ֣ע ׀ <sup>5265 </sup> <n>And there went forth</n> מֵאֵ֣ת <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>from the LORD</n> וַיָּ֣גָז <sup>1468 </sup> <n>and brought</n> שַׂלְוִים֮ <sup>7958 </sup> <n>quails</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> הַיָּם֒ <sup>3220 </sup> <n>from the sea</n> וַיִּטֹּ֨שׁ <sup>5203 </sup> <n>and let [them] fall</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>beside</n> הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֜ה <sup>4264 </sup> <n>by the camp</n> כְּדֶ֧רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>journey</n> י֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>as it were a day's</n> כֹּ֗ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>on this side</n> וּכְדֶ֤רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>journey</n> יוֹם֙ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>and as it were a day's</n> כֹּ֔ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>on the other side</n> סְבִיב֖וֹת <sup>5439 </sup> <n>round about</n> הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <sup>4264 </sup> <n>the camp</n> וּכְאַמָּתַ֖יִם <sup>520 </sup> <n>and as it were two cubits</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>beside</n> פְּנֵ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>[high] upon the face</n> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n>
32: וַיָּ֣קָם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>stood up</n> הָעָ֡ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>And the people</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַיּוֹם֩ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>all that day</n> הַה֨וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> הַלַּ֜יְלָה <sup>3915 </sup> <n>and all [that] night</n> וְכֹ֣ל ׀ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> י֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>day</n> הַֽמָּחֳרָ֗ת <sup>4283 </sup> <n>and all the next</n> וַיַּֽאַסְפוּ֙ <sup>622 </sup> <n>and they gathered</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַשְּׂלָ֔ו <sup>7958 </sup> <n>the quails</n> הַמַּמְעִ֕יט <sup>4591 </sup> <n>he that gathered least</n> אָסַ֖ף <sup>622 </sup> <n>gathered</n> עֲשָׂרָ֣ה <sup>6235 </sup> <n>ten</n> חֳמָרִ֑ים <sup>2563 </sup> <n>homers</n> וַיִּשְׁטְח֤וּ <sup>7849 </sup> <n>and they spread</n> לָהֶם֙ שָׁט֔וֹחַ <sup>7849 </sup> <n>[them] all abroad</n> סְבִיב֖וֹת <sup>5439 </sup> <n>for themselves round about</n> הַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <sup>4264 </sup> <n>the camp</n>
33: הַבָּשָׂ֗ר <sup>1320 </sup> <n>And while the flesh</n> עוֹדֶ֙נּוּ֙ <sup>5750 </sup> <n>was still</n> בֵּ֣ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>between</n> שִׁנֵּיהֶ֔ם <sup>8127 </sup> <n>between their teeth</n> טֶ֖רֶם <sup>2962 </sup> <n>[was] yet</n> יִכָּרֵ֑ת <sup>3772 </sup> <n>ere it was chewed</n> וְאַ֤ף <sup>639 </sup> <n>the wrath</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> חָרָ֣ה <sup>2734 </sup> <n>was kindled</n> בָעָ֔ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>against the people</n> וַיַּ֤ךְ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>smote</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>and the LORD</n> בָּעָ֔ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>the people</n> מַכָּ֖ה <sup>4347 </sup> <n>plague</n> רַבָּ֥ה <sup>7227 </sup> <n>great</n> מְאֹֽד׃ <sup>3966 </sup> <n>with a very</n>
34: וַיִּקְרָ֛א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>And he called</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שֵֽׁם־ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>the name</n> הַמָּק֥וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>of that place</n> הַה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> קִבְר֣וֹת הַֽתַּאֲוָ֑ה <sup>6914 </sup> <n>Kibrothhattaavah</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> שָׁם֙ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> קָֽבְר֔וּ <sup>6912 </sup> <n>because there they buried</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָעָ֖ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>the people</n> הַמִּתְאַוִּֽים׃ <sup>183 </sup> <n>that lusted</n>
35: מִקִּבְר֧וֹת הַֽתַּאֲוָ֛ה <sup>6914 </sup> <n>from Kibrothhattaavah</n> נָסְע֥וּ <sup>5265 </sup> <n>journeyed</n> הָעָ֖ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>[And] the people</n> חֲצֵר֑וֹת <sup>2698 </sup> <n>unto Hazeroth</n> וַיִּהְי֖וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>remained</n> בַּחֲצֵרֽוֹת׃ <sup>2698 </sup> <n>and abode at Hazeroth</n> פ
